data.text: @HislopMD But haven’t they been used for gene therapy?  Isn’t that where the technology came from to develop the vaccine so quickly.

@Merz @HislopMD the AAV-based retinal degeneration therapy, and the AAV lung alpha-1 antitrypsin therapy, are both billed as 'gene therapy' even though AAV typically does not integrate.  Yes, it's more longlasting than mRNA transfection. Agreed these gene therapies affect only targeted tissues

@HislopMD can imagine if gene therapy were that easy

we'd have cured everything by now
@HislopMD And gene therapy doesn't even modify genes in all cells. Just in a targeted subset of your cells and tissues. And not the germline, at all.
@HislopMD Had to give the same explanation today.  But you know the “reaearch on ivermectin is  better than the vaccine. Facepalm before launching into that salvo.
@AM_Baxter The purchase you made with your credit card, which led to you seeing the Facebook ad for the thing you just bought.
@HislopMD But which one tracks personal location and checking account balance, the vaccine or the gene therapy?? Asking for a friend... 😬#scienceforthewin #again
